Description: Glazed composition shabti of Ptahhotep born of Tasheretker with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-bag which hangs over the shoulder, the waist is inscribed with a band of incised hieroglyphs and there is a similarly inscribed column running down the front of the legs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: SLAntiq (number still to be ascertained)
